kannada_original: ಹಿರಿದ ಕಾಣದ ನಿಲವು ಬರಿ ಬರಡು ಕನವರಿಕೆ
english_transliteration: Hirida kāṇada nilavu bari baraḍu kanavarike
english_translation: A stance that does not see the great is mere barren hallucination
It is better to live knowing the beauty of existence.

kannada_original: ಇದೆ ಬೆಣ್ಣೆ ಇದೆ ತುಪ್ಪ, ಮೊಸರ ಕಡೆ ಮಂತಿಂದ
english_transliteration: Ide beṇṇe ide tuppa, mosara kaḍe mantinda
english_translation: There is butter, there is ghee, churn the curd with a churner
Throw away the chaff and get the essence – Dear Rama.
